attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should allow employees who benefit from private medical to not be taxed.  By having private medical care it is saving the NHS money so employees who benefit from this should be given tax relief.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. It also overlaps this petition http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/private-health/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
